abstract: Box Seats column; Michigan's Brianna Amat is not merely the female place-kicker on her Pinckney Community High School boys' football team, she also feels accepted by her teammates.
snippet: Brianna Amat does not merely play football on a boys’ team in Michigan; she also feels accepted by her teammates.
lead_paragraph: Brianna Amat does not merely play football on a boys’ team in Michigan; she also feels accepted by her teammates.

headline.main: Even in a Locker Room Apart, an Undeniable Leap of Progress
headline.print_headline: Even in a Locker Room Apart, An Undeniable Leap of Progress
headline.seo: Female Football Player Represents Remarkable Progress for Women
